main: ^Donsol, Sorsogon, in the southernmost tip of Luzon, is where the world-famous whale sharks are found. Whale Sharks also called Butanding by locals. A whale shark is a slow-moving large type of fish. The head is wide and flat with two small eyes at the front corners.

c-0: ^A whale shark is a slow-moving large type of fish. The head is wide and flat with two small eyes at the front corners.
